short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automating some actions for Level up your Steam account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is extension of Google Chrome browsers for Steam users. Automate processes for getting badges.

Features:
 -  Automated purchase of cards for not unlocked Badges. This feature allows you to scan your inventory and get the cheapest badges at Steam market place. (Demo at screenshot's)
